by that shout, if only to express his rapture fully. 
The Tsar stopped a few minutes in front of the hussars as if undecided. 
"How can the Emperor be undecided?" thought Rost6v, but then even this indecision appeared to him majestic and enchanting, like everything else the Tsar did. 
That hesitation lasted only an instant. The Tsar's foot, in the narrow pointed boot then fashionable, touched the groin of the bobtailed bay mare he rode, his hand in a white glove gathered up the reins, and
